title: The Huge adventures of Trevor, a cat (K)
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird, David Atkinson and John Taylor
brief_description: An unusual and humorous animation about an unusual cat whose hunting instincts are accidentally over-revived. (Awards: Australian Film Institute Best Animation 1986)
